name: Adventure of The SubMarine Boy
description:
An epic adventure fueled by imagination. Enter a gorgeous world in a game about friendship, exploration & submarine.

Will SubMarine Boy be able to save the SubMarine Land?

1280x800 Resolution + Full Screen Highly Recommended

nvm just play the game on any resolution that fits your screen...

Arrow Keys to Move

E to Inspect

Space to Activates

sometimes you cannot turn on your laptop ( it's a bug )
try restarting the game/play on windowed/change resolution
